channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Drivers Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Drivers Management

item.title: CVE-2020-8317|2024-09-17T00:10:49.213Z -- lenovo -- drivers%20management
item.description: A DLL search path vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Drivers Management prior to version 2.7.1128.1046 that could allow an authenticated user to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2020-8326|2024-09-17T03:13:27.066Z -- lenovo -- drivers%20management
item.description: An unquoted service path vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Drivers Management prior to version 2.7.1128.1046 that could allow an authenticated user to execute code with elevated privileges.
